channel.title: Dynamic joining
channel.description: Add a feature that lets you flexibly join either Casual or Classic mode, based on whichever room fills up first. It is annoying to have to switch between the two, when you don't care which mode you want to play, but just want to start your game. This will be a godsend on slow lobby days.

item.title: Dynamic joining
item.dc:creator: orangeandblack5
item.description:
This would be a really good idea.

Read full topic
